name: Zhoot IT - LD 46
description:
Hello IT! 

You are a robot called IT and you need to survive in the harsh world of WWW. 

Everything you do in the world drains energy from you and the only way to get more energy is to kill you enemies. Find the portal and save IT

Controls

WASD to move
Mouse to aim and fire (Press M to change mouse sensitivity)
Left Shift to run

This game was made for the game jam Ludum dare 46 and was made in 17 hours.
